#id=1
#text=Yesterday , I found that my bicycle tire was flat and would have to be repaired .
#id=2
#text=First , I went to the store in town to purchase a machine that would inflate my bike tire .
#id=3
#text=Next , I went to my garage , which is where I keep my bike .
#id=4
#text=I found the nozzle in the bike tire where the air is supposed to be pumped into .
#id=5
#text=I plugged the machine into the wall socket and then attached the nozzle from the machine onto the nozzle on the bike .
#id=6
#text=I hit the switch , which caused the machine to beep as it added air into the tire .
#id=7
#text=I watched the gauge on the machine to make sure there was n't too much pressure ; I did n't want my tire to pop like a balloon .
#id=8
#text=Finally , when I saw that there was enough air in the tire , I turned off the machine and removed it before closing the bike 's tire nozzle tight .
#id=9
#text=Now my tire is good as new and I can ride around wherever I 'd like to go .
#text=I 'm glad I got this important job done .
